text: Pedro Rocha (3 December 1942 - 2 December 2013) was a former Uruguayan football player. He has played for Uruguay national team. He died on 2 December 2013 in São Paulo of stomach cancer, one day before his 71st bithday. ==Club career statistics== |- |1971||rowspan="7"|São Paulo||rowspan="7"|Série A||15||0 |- |1972||18||17 |- |1973||34||8 |- |1974||11||1 |- |1975||22||3 |- |1976||11||0 |- |1977||0||0 |- |1978||Coritiba||Série A||20||1 |- |1979||Palmeiras||Série A||0||0 131||30 131||30 |} ==International career statistics== |- |1961||1||0 |- |1962||5||0 |- |1963||2||0 |- |1964||0||0 |- |1965||9||5 |- |1966||7||1 |- |1967||10||8 |- |1968||8||0 |- |1969||5||1 |- |1970||2||1 |- |1971||0||0 |- |1972||0||0 |- |1973||0||0 |- |1974||3||1 |- !Total||52||17 |} ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Uruguayan football managers Category:Coritiba Foot Ball Club players
